    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • ConvexPolygon

        public ConvexPolygon(Point2D... vertices)
        input vertices must be in order.
        パラメータ:
        vertices - Point2Ds for this. They must be in order and they must not have redundant points in the same side.

        戻り値:
